steps.intro: The switch between edit mode and view mode click it now
Mother continuum tile, click to activate - deactivate a green tile means an active state
Child continuum tile, click to activate - deactivate a blu tile means an active state
On an active column is possible to select one or more interventions
Select one or more constraints from here, this will rule what kind of constraints is possible to select in the applicaiton row
A cell with a red dot means that the related column is not active, and cannot be interacted with
A cell with a green dot means that the related column is active and can be used to create a bubble, click one single time this cell

To create a bubble a second click, on the same cell or on a new cell, is needed the bubble will span between all the contiguous cell between the first cell selected and the second one, click here to generate a four cell bubble
Is now possible to type text inside the newly created bubble, let's do it now: click and type
Once at least one bubble is created the row get activated and it is possible to select constraints
The application is now active, to show the subapp click on the application name
